meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Roth Jan Hofmann Craig Campbell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1062.

td.p: Scott Roth, an attorney originally from New York
Jan Hofmann, a writer originally from Oak Ridge, Tennessee
Craig Campbell, an advertising executive from Victorville, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $10,799)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "C"
MYTHS & LEGENDS
INTERNATIONAL TRIVIA
FUNNY FELINES
SWEETS
THE FOOT

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
